title: Homepage loads with hero, search, and category filters
description: Verify that the Home page loads correctly displaying the hero section, search input, and category filters with all default content visible.

steps.description: Navigate to the Home page URL
Confirm the hero section is visible with all intended content
Check that the search input field is present and empty
Verify category filter options are displayed and selectable

title: Navigation to Bundles page displays correct content
description: Ensure navigating to the Bundles view via the navbar renders the correct page content with appropriate bundle listings.

steps.description: Click the 'Bundles' link in the navbar
Verify the Bundles page loads with featured bundles and content
Confirm URL updates to Bundles route

title: Navigation to Series page displays correct content
description: Confirm that clicking the Series link in the navbar loads the Series view with the correct series displayed.

steps.description: Select the 'Series' link from the navbar
The Series page loads showing series listings
URL updates to the Series route

title: NotFound page displays on invalid URL
description: Verify that accessing an undefined route renders the NotFound page gracefully with appropriate messaging.

steps.description: Manually enter an invalid URL path
NotFound page is shown with correct 404 message

title: Reusable UI components render with consistent style
description: Check that key UI components such as navbar, footer, dialogs, forms, and tables render properly and use consistent styles.

steps.description: Navigate through multiple pages containing UI components
All UI components render with consistent styling and expected design
Check responsiveness of UI components on desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports

title: Theme toggling applies dark and light CSS variables correctly
description: Verify that toggling themes updates CSS variables and styles accordingly, with initial default dark theme and future light theme toggle.

steps.description: Default theme is dark with correct color contrast
Toggle theme to light mode
Page updates to light theme colors with CSS variable changes
Toggle theme back to dark mode
Dark theme styling is restored correctly

title: Interactive map widget loads and responds correctly
description: Test that the embedded map widget on the page loads properly, renders markers or relevant map data, and responds to user interactions.

steps.description: Navigate to page containing the map widget
Map renders with correct region and markers
Interact with map (zoom, pan)
Map responds smoothly to interactions without errors

title: Chart and carousel widgets load and animate correctly
description: Verify that chart and carousel widgets appear on the page and that animations and interactions function smoothly without visual glitches.

steps.description: Access page with chart and carousel widgets
Charts display correct data visualizations and update as intended
Carousel shows images/items and allows navigation
Use carousel navigation controls
Carousel animates smoothly without frame drops or glitches

title: Express server correctly serves static assets and SPA routing fallback
description: Ensure the Express server serves static files correctly from the dist/public directory and falls back to index.html for client-side routes.

steps.description: Start the Express server
Request static assets such as CSS, JS bundles, and images
Static assets are served with correct headers and no errors
Navigate to valid client-side routes (Home, Bundles, Series)
Server returns index.html and client renders the correct view
Navigate to unknown route
Server fallback to index.html occurs and NotFound page is rendered client-side

title: Search functionality returns accurate results
description: Test that search input on Home page returns matching products or content dynamically according to user query.

steps.description: Enter valid search term in the Home page search input
Matching results are displayed accurately reflecting the query
Enter search term with no matching results
No results message or empty state is shown
Clear the search input
All default products or content is restored

title: Category filters correctly filter displayed content
description: Verify that selecting various category filters updates the display to show only relevant products or offerings on the Home page.

steps.description: Select a category filter
Displayed products update to only those matching the category
Select multiple category filters if supported
Displayed products match selected combined categories
Deselect all filters
All products are displayed again

title: Animations and icons integrate without visual glitches
description: Check that all animations using framer-motion and icons via lucide-react render smoothly without visual defects.

steps.description: Navigate through pages with animations and icons
Animations play smoothly and icons display correctly
No flickering, layout shifts, or broken icons observed

title: Responsive design works on mobile, tablet, and desktop
description: Ensure the website layout and components adapt correctly to various screen sizes and device types.

steps.description: Open the website on a desktop browser
Layout, navigation, and UI components display properly
Resize viewport to tablet dimensions
UI adjusts for tablet size without overlap or accessibility issues
Use mobile viewport or device simulator
Mobile layout is optimized with accessible menus, readable fonts, and no horizontal scrolling

title: Accessibility compliance including color contrast checks
description: Verify that the application meets accessibility requirements including sufficient color contrast for both dark and light themes.

steps.description: Use accessibility tools to measure color contrast ratios for all text and UI elements in dark theme
Switch to light theme
Validate color contrast standards compliance in light theme
Check all interactive elements have appropriate keyboard focus states and ARIA labels

title: Bengali text renders with correct encoding and fonts
description: Validate that all Bengali language text in the UI displays correctly with proper font rendering and encoding.

steps.description: Load pages containing Bengali text
Bengali text appears correctly without garbled characters or missing glyphs
Verify font style and size are consistent and readable for Bengali script

title: Application loads pages within acceptable performance metrics
description: Ensure pages load quickly and bundle size is optimized for performance on typical devices and networks.

steps.description: Measure page load times on Home, Bundles, and Series pages with typical network conditions
Page load times meet specified performance benchmarks
Bundle size remains within acceptable limits without excessive dependencies

title: Application functions correctly on Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge browsers
description: Test core functionality and UI renderings across major browsers for compatibility and consistent behavior.

steps.description: Open website in Chrome browser and verify major flows
No rendering or functionality issues in Chrome
Repeat steps for Firefox, Safari, and Edge
All browsers display consistent UI and flows

title: Loading states display appropriately during async operations
description: Check that asynchronous loading states for dynamic content or widgets are visible and appropriate to inform users during data fetching.

steps.description: Trigger data loads for maps, charts, or search results
Loading indicators appear promptly and disappear once data is loaded
No content flicker or stale data is shown during loading

title: Placeholders and navigation for planned features present
description: Verify UI includes placeholders or navigation elements for planned features like shopping cart, authentication, checkout, and admin dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate through the navbar and dialogs looking for planned feature placeholders
Placeholders or entry points for planned features exist and are not broken

title: SEO and analytics scaffolding implemented correctly
description: Check that metadata and analytics tracking scripts or scaffolding exist and are correctly configured for future use.

steps.description: Inspect page source for SEO meta tags (title, description, etc.)
Meta tags are well-formed and relevant
Verify analytics script or scaffold code is included
Analytics code loads without errors

title: Multi-language support toggles Bengali and English smoothly
description: Test toggling language support between Bengali and English text, ensuring proper rendering and seamless switching.

steps.description: Switch language toggle from English to Bengali
All translatable text updates accurately in Bengali
Switch language toggle back to English
Text switches smoothly back to English with no residual artifacts
